message.raw: Fixed a bug where using port0/channel31 in your labscript (attached to an ni_pcie_6363) would cause all digital channels on that device to go high at the end of the experiment. This was because we had an overflow error because we had used int32 instead of uint32 in one part of the code!
message.html: Fixed a bug where using port0/channel31 in your labscript (attached to an ni_pcie_6363) would cause all digital channels on that device to go high at the end of the experiment. This was because we had an overflow error because we had used int32 instead of uint32 in one part of the code!
